definitions.definition: believing that people only do things to help themselves rather than for good or honest reasons

examples.text: Do you have to be so cynical about everything?
Her lips curled into a cynical smile.

definitions.definition: not believing that something good will happen or that something is important

examples.text: I'm a bit cynical about the benefits of the plan.
Her experiences with men have made her thoroughly cynical about love.
I'm a little cynical about her motives.

definitions.definition: not caring that something might hurt other people, if there is some advantage for you

examples.text: a cynical disregard for the safety of others
